name: Illinois James: Escape From Stoplight Sanctum
name_original: Illinois James: Escape From Stoplight Sanctum
description:
Play as Illinois James as you escape from the cursed Spotlight Sanctum, a place where the world is controlled by magic lights that glow green, yellow, and red. Be careful, a red light can completely remove your control of Illinois, but if you time your movements right, you can use this unguided mania to your advantage!

Made for the 2020 GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
